title: Pharmaceutical Clinical Trial Protocols
introduction: Describes the representation of a Clinical Trial protocol to enable to exchange of the protocol between different actors.  This includes transfers: > from Sponsor to Regulator(s) and responses as part of the protocol approval process;  > from Clinical Trial Management Systems to EHR systems to enable integration of trial execution and individual patient care plans; > between Clinical Trial Managers and potential Trial Sites to establish if a site can provide sufficient suitable trial subjects.  The IG also provides a basic mapping of the necessary concepts to their FHIR equivalents and defines necessary vocabulary.
